message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to save some money.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $14,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $11,250. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my finances.
